snippet: On his first drive after taking over for Mark Sanchez in the third quarter, Greg McElroy revitalized a stagnant offense by throwing a touchdown pass, one of the few highlights in a dismal game.
abstract: New York jets defeat Arizona Cardinals, 7-6; Jets quarterback Greg McElroy, making his NFL debut, replaces struggling quarterback Mark Sanchez late in the third quarter and leads scoring drive.
lead_paragraph: On his first drive after taking over for Mark Sanchez in the third quarter, Greg McElroy revitalized a stagnant offense by throwing a touchdown pass, one of the few highlights in a dismal game.

headline.seo: Jets Win as McElroy Replaces Sanchez
headline.main: McElroy Replaces Sanchez and Leads Jets to Victory Over Cardinals
